DOC.brief_summary: The trial seeks to determine if apixaban, an investigational anticoagulant (blood-thinner) is as effective as standard therapy (warfarin) in preventing stroke and systemic embolism in subjects with atrial fibrillation and risk factors for stroke.
DOC.brief_title: Apixaban for the Prevention of Stroke in Subjects With Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Males and females ≥ 18 yrs with atrial fibrillation (AF) and one or more of the following risk factors for stroke: Age ≥ 75, previous stroke transient ischemic attack (TIA) or Systemic Embolism (SE) Symptomatic congestive heart failure or left ventricular dysfunction with left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) ≤ 40% Diabetes mellitus or hypertension requiring pharmacological treatment
